title: 3 and Out - McVay Retirement Clickbait, Kupp Draft Lessons, Deshaun Watson Market, Rodgers Decision, Harbaugh NFL Inevitability
itunes:title: 3 and Out - McVay Retirement Clickbait, Kupp Draft Lessons, Deshaun Watson Market, Rodgers Decision, Harbaugh NFL Inevitability
description:
John explains why the flurry of retirement talk surrounding McVay and Aaron Donald was always ridiculous, why Cooper Kupp's 3rd round draft position wasn't a scouting failure, if teams will pursue Deshaun Watson this off-season despite pending legal issues, which NFC North team would benefit most by Aaron Rodgers leaving Green Bay, and why Jim Harbaugh will eventually return to the NFL.

Subscribe NOW and follow The Volume on Twitter, Instagram + YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
